FuncDef: The display configuration trial status command displays the trial running status of a system configuration. The display configuration trial status command displays the trial running status of a system configuration.
ExtraInfo:
To view the trial running status of a system configuration, run the display configuration trial status command.
Trial running is initiated by NETCONF. If the trial running packets carry the persistency mark, the trial running status information of a system configuration contains the persistency mark.
